hr.content:
Zbirku namještaja i ura čini građa opreme stanova i kuća Pazina i Pazinštine datirana u razdoblje od 17. do 20. stoljeća, a dijeli se u tri veće skupine:
−namještaj opreme kuća i stanova – škrinje, komode, toaletni i noćni ormarići, stolci, naslonjači, vitrine i ormari
−peći na drva
−podni i zidni satovi.
Određeni se broj predmeta unutar zbirke vezuje uz istaknutu obitelj De Franceschi iz Gologorice, dio zbirke čine i garniture namještaja, a cjelokupna je zbirka svjedok života bogatijeg, dobrostojećeg društvenog sloja u građanskom, poluurbanom ili ruralnom prostoru Pazinštine.

en.content:
Collection of Furniture and Clocks gathers items which once belonged to the equipment of houses and apartments in Pazin and its surroundings. Fundus of the Collection dates in the period between the 17th and the 20th century and can be dividid into three larger groups:  
−Equipment of houses and apartments – chests, commodes, dressers and bedside tables, chairs, armchairs, cabinets and closets, 
−Wood stoves, 
−floor and wall clocks. 
Some of the items within the Collection are connected with the distinguished family De Franceschi from Gologorica. Together with sets of various furniture, the Collection in whole is a witness of the wealthy social class in the urban, semiurban and rural area.
